title: The Asset Allocator: A Stock That Could Hold Up In A Bear Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: I recently went shopping for an investment I thought could hold up during a bear market. This podcast (8:47) describes my adventures looking at ETFs and individual stocks, particularly my unexpected fascination with the Invesco DWA Consumer Staples Momentum ETF (PSL), but my ultimate choice of Molson Coors Brewing Company (TAP). Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
